data.title: The teacher creates a course
data.body: Teacher creates a course and receives a special unique code for distributing to students

data.title: Students Register for course
data.body: Student register for course using the unique code provided by teacher

data.title: The teacher sets up an assignment
data.body: You start process by setting up your assignment. You pick a feedback rubric from our library or create your own, select an assignment template and you're ready to get started.

data.title: Students submit their work
data.body: Students submit their work to your assignment. They can submit anything â€“ text, files, videos, links and even Google docs!

data.title: Students review each other
data.body: Your students give each other anonymous feedback through your rubric.

data.title: The teacher has a complete overview
data.body: You get the complete overview of everything that is happening in the assignment.
